elements.name: panel2
elements.title: Step 1: Recognize the problem

elements.name: Frage2
elements.title: Do you consider the fact that the manufacture of cheap products is associated with external effects to be a major or a minor problem? Give your opinion briefly and succinctly.

elements.description: Ist bereits ausgeführt (die Herstellung von Billigprodukten erzeugt in verschiedener Hinsicht externe Effekte).

elements.name: panel3
elements.title: Step 3: Change of perspective

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Make a note of two other important players. Tip: One actor lives in the country of manufacture, the other in Switzerland, for example.
elements.correctAnswer: Consumers, e.g. in Switzerland / employees (adults and children) of companies that produce (or have produced) cheap products.

elements.description: In das Problem sind mindestens vier wichtige Akteure involviert. Zwei davon sind: 1. Unternehmen, die Billigprodukte herstellen (lassen), 2. Gesellschaft im Herstellungsland, die Umweltproblemen ausgesetzt ist.

elements.name: panel4
elements.title: Step 4: Conflicting objectives

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Employees <–> Company
elements.correctAnswer: On the one hand, employees want a decent wage and healthy working conditions. On the other hand, companies want to achieve the highest possible profits. The higher the wages or expenses/costs for production, the lower the profits.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Society in the country of manufacture that is exposed to environmental problems <–> Company
elements.correctAnswer: On the one hand, the environment can only remain intact if it is not polluted. On the other hand, environmental protection measures result in higher costs and therefore lower profits for companies.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: Consumers <–> Workers & society in the country of production, which is exposed to environmental problems
elements.correctAnswer: Consumers want to pay as little as possible for products. However, cheap products can only be manufactured if (among other things) workers' wages are reduced and no additional costs are incurred for environmental protection measures.

elements.description: Studieren Sie die Grafik. Beschreiben Sie, welche Zielkonflikte zwischen folgenden Akteuren bestehen.

elements.name: panel5
elements.title: Step 5: Options for action

elements.name: question6
elements.title: Consumers:
elements.correctAnswer: Avoiding cheap goods (in some cases), buying sustainably produced goods, shopping in second-hand stores, campaigning politically for more sustainable and fairer production conditions in manufacturing countries.

elements.name: question7
elements.title: Company:
elements.correctAnswer: Increase prices, take adequate environmental protection measures, reduce profits.
